product_name: CliniqueClarifying Face Lotion 3 - For Combination Oily Skin
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Clarifying Face Lotion 3 is a dermatologist-developed exfoliating lotion for combination/oily skin types. Sweeps away dulling flakes and excess oil.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Type: Combination Oily.Gentle, refreshing formula is the difference-maker for healthy skin.Sweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer skin.Preps skin for moisturizer - exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.For oilier skin types, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimize excess oil and keep pores clear.Dermatologist-developed for high-performance results.Create great skin with Clinique's twice-daily 3-Step Skincare System developed by a celebrated dermatologist.It's simple: cleanse with Facial Soap, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+ or oil-free Gel. Each step is customized for your skin type.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilSLSSLESSulfatesGlutenFragranceItem 2153915How To UseUse lotion twice a day, morning and night after cleansing. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck. For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips. Follow with Step 3: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Face Lotion+, Gel or Cream.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Alcohol Denat., Salicylic Acid, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, BHT, Phenoxyethanol, Benzophenone-4, Ext. Violet 2 (CI 60730), Red 6 (CI 15850), Orange 4 (CI 15510).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use lotion twice a day, morning and night after cleansing. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck. For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips. Follow with Step 3: Dramatically Different Moisturizing Face Lotion+, Gel or Cream.

reviews.headline: So glad I've returned to it!
reviews.comments: I was using years ago and stopped thinking it wasn't 'helping'.  Recently returned to using and so glad I have.

reviews.headline: Only Product My Boyfriend Uses
reviews.comments: He religiously uses this stuff after washing his face and coming out of the shower. Helps keep the oils and breakouts at bay. When he doesn't use it he notices a negative impact on his skin. It doesn't dry his skin out and helps with flakes around his nose and mouth.

reviews.headline: The BEST!
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this product! I am 59 and been using it since my 20's. Cannot express the difference this product has made in my skin care routine (am and pm). Add in the Clinique lotion, and I have (always) been a Clinique product lover for more than 35+ years. Use it…it's light and moisturizing…love it!!!

reviews.headline: VERY strong alcohol scent
reviews.comments: i used this around a handful of times, and my skin always feels clean afterwards, but it's the scent that ruins it for me. this product has a STRONG scent. when i use this, i get strong migraines due to the scent. it does it's job, but be mindful of the scent

reviews.headline: I keep buying this over and over
reviews.comments: Great for preventing breakouts

reviews.headline: Yes I would buy again.
reviews.comments: It's helping me faster than I thought

reviews.headline: Love love love this !!!!
reviews.comments: My skin is dry to combo !!!! This balance my skin and , i wash my face with liquid facial mild soap and then i used my number 3 !!!! And the my dramatically lotion , before i do my makeup , and my makeup always looks flawless!!! You need the whole 3 steps !!!!

reviews.headline: Enjoy this product
reviews.comments: Works great. Keeps my face healthy.

reviews.headline: Caused purging
reviews.comments: This product may work well for some, but it just wasn't right for my skin. Every time I used the Clinique exfoliator—even just once a week—I would break out really badly, sometimes with two or more new pimples each time. I've spoken with others who've used it, and many said it didn't cause purging or breakouts for them, so it clearly varies from person to person. Unfortunately, for me, it caused more harm than good. If you have acne-prone or sensitive skin, I'd definitely recommend patch-testing before committing.

reviews.headline: tried & true
reviews.comments: i'm so glad i've come back to my clinique 3-step skincare routine after about 15-20 years. i have strong memories of fighting my teenage acne with this same exact formula. it helped me fight breakouts then & still does now in my 30s too!

reviews.headline: Great product to keep oily skin balanced and acne free
reviews.comments: Been using for years. It's great to prevent breakouts when used 2-3 times a week and even helped with drying out acne. Clinique is good product line.

reviews.headline: Not meant for my skin
reviews.comments: Im happy to see that this profuct works great for others, however it didnt work for me. I tried it for 3 weeks and it mildly broke my skin out across my face and jawline. I had clear skin for a while until I tried this product. I have combination skin and have a healthy lifestyle, so I concluded that it had to be this product causing the ance. Again, this product had worked well for others, so it may work well for you!

reviews.headline: Always come back to this toner
reviews.comments: Not the cleanest ingredients which is why it lost a star, but i always come back to this product. I've strayed and tried many of toners from many brands and this is the only one that helps my acne and leaves me feeling clean

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: I like it is good for my face

reviews.headline: Strong alcohol scent!
reviews.comments: Bought this in a recent Ulta sale and wish I would have read the bad reviews instead of the good ones! This face lotion has a highly strong alcohol smell, that bad that I almost feel nausea when applying it! How on earth can this face lotion have so many good reviews? I wish I new beforehand that this contains alcohol, then I would never have purchased it. Thankfully I am still in the return window and will bring this to an Ulta store right away. If you have sensistive skin and are sensitive to alcohol scent, you should better look for a different face lotion. I would not recommend this lotion at all!

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Clinique clarifying lotion keeps my skin feeling clean and hydrated. I use this lotion 2x daily. I keep it in my daily travel kit in case I am unexpectedly out overnight.

reviews.headline: 30+ years of satisfaction with use
reviews.comments: Clinique is the brand I always go back to

reviews.headline: if breaking out this helps calm down your skin
reviews.comments: i had a reaction to a product and this has helped my skin calm down from the irritation

reviews.headline: This will always be in my skincare collection
reviews.comments: Leaves my face so beautiful and clear

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: I have been using this for years and will continue for many years to come!

media.headline: This will always be in my skincare collection
media.caption: Love love clinque

media.headline: I have used this product for about 30 years and love it!
I would travel to the end of the earth for this!
media.caption: Third days using this toner.

faceoff_positive.comments: I have used Clinique products for a dozen-ish years now, and have no plans to ever change that. They are consistent, and my skin is clear. In the past, I have tried other things from time to time, but have always come back to Clinique because nothing compares.
faceoff_positive.headline: Customer for life!

faceoff_negative.comments: I have been using Clinique for years and am disappointed in the new Clarifying lotion #3 formula which appears to be a watered down version of the old formula.I'm oily and It doesn't exfoliate as well and you don't feel the tingle. I even stepped up to the #4 and it's slightly better but doesn't do as good a job. The original formulas were much better for oily skin.
faceoff_negative.headline: Clarifying #3

rollup.name: Clarifying Face Lotion 3 - For Combination Oily Skin
